content: looking to add a handmade touch to your style in this quick and easy crochet tutorial i ll show you how to crochet this beautiful ribbed headband using simple modifications of the slip_stitch and single_crochet i ll show you how to create ribbing and beautiful textures this cozy and stylish headband is perfect for any time of year this is also a quick and simple pattern that makes a great gift or crochet project for crafts fairs or to sell on etsy even beginners will find this step-by-step crochet video easy to follow so grab your yarn and hook and let s get started you can easily adjust the size by adding or subtracting row to make the band wider or narrower
